Sentencas: Biogas has been used to power a small tubular solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Biogas powering a small tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It was demonstrated that biogas could provide power equivalent to hydrogen, even when the methane content was reduced below the value at which normal combustion could occur.
Titulo: Biogas powering a small tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The carbon dioxide content of biogas was especially beneficial because it aided the internal reforming process.
Titulo: Biogas powering a small tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: But carbon deposition was a problem unless air was added to the biogas before it entered the cell.
Titulo: Biogas powering a small tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: When air was premixed, the biogas was comparable with hydrogen in the power produced.
Titulo: Biogas powering a small tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, a problem was the variability of biogas samples.
Titulo: Biogas powering a small tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Of the three types tested, only one produced a consistent power output.
Titulo: Biogas powering a small tubular solid oxide fuel cell
